attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Political advisers and the new Director of Strategy at Number 10 Downing Street are pure party political appointments and the incumbents have no loyalty nor responsibility of impartiality to the taxpayers of the nation and therefore they should not receive remuneration out of the public purse.  Political appointees, appointed purely to further the interests of elected politicians and party political matters within government are NOT civil servants and are NOT entitled to be paid out of public funds.
